price: Lalle ne waɗanda suka kãfirta, lalle dã sunã da abin da ke a cikin ƙasa gabã ɗaya da misãlinsa tãre da shi, dõmin su yi fansa da shi daga azãbar Rãnar ¡iyãma, bã a karɓarsa daga gare su, kuma sunã da azãba mai raɗadi.
arabic: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ لَوۡ أَنَّ لَهُم مَّا فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ جَمِيعٗا وَمِثۡلَهُۥ مَعَهُۥ لِيَفۡتَدُواْ بِهِۦ مِنۡ عَذَابِ يَوۡمِ ٱلۡقِيَٰمَةِ مَا تُقُبِّلَ مِنۡهُمۡۖ وَلَهُمۡ عَذَابٌ أَلِيمٞ

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: inna alladhīna kafarū law anna lahum mā fī al-arḍi jamīʿan wamith'lahu maʿahu liyaftadū bihi min ʿadhābi yawmi al-qiyāmati mā tuqubbila min'hum walahum ʿadhābun alīmun
